shuddha wu bayibalaya: esakiyel - parichchedaya 38 swaminwahansege wachanaya ma wethata pamina kiyanuye: 2 manushya puthraya, roshhida meshekhida thubalhida adhipathiya wana magog deshaye gogta wiruddhawa numbae muhuna harawagana, ohuta wiruddhawa anagathawakya kiyamin: 3 swamiwu dewiyanwahanse mese kiyanasekayi kiyanna balawa, roshhida meshekhida thubalhida adhipathiya wana gog, mama numbaata wiruddhayemi. 4 mama numbaa passata harawa, numbae hakuwala koku dama, numbaa saha numbae mulu senawa asunda asuruwanda athuluwa pitathata genayannemi; owun siyalloma alankara wasthra andagana, palisda kuda palisda athi mahath samuhayakwa, siyalloma kadu pawichchi karannowa sitithi. 5 owun samanga parsiwaruda kushwaruda putwaruda sitithi; owun siyallanta palisda yuddha thoppida thibe. 6 gomer saha ohuge siyalu samudawalda uthure durasthanawala thogarma wanshaya saha ohuge siyalu samudawalda yana boho janayo numbaa samanga sitithi. 7 numbaa sudanamwi, eseya, numbaa wethata raswa sitina numbae siyalu samuhayan samanga (siyalla) sudanamkaragena, owunge pradhaniya wenna. 8 boho dawas giya pasu numbaa pradhanakamata pathwi, kaduwen midi thibena deshayakata mathu awuruduwaladi enawa atha.
